rows.label: tlk46500174_01_msg0002
rows.name:
This is a place of rest and recreation
for the public. We also teach children
about Acedia's lore and traditions here.

rows.label: tlk46500174_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you're headed for the cathedral, head
straight across to the other side of the
Plaza. It's always worth a visit.
